185544124.review:
“[b]World War II᎓ Panzer Claws[/b]” is a real－time strategy game, with simple mechanics that are next to [i]humorous and dumb[/i] if you are engaged in topics regarding war strategy. The game is very simple, with easy mechanics, beautiful scenery and simple graphics — [i]in my honest opinion[/i], they aren’t ugly, considering when it was first released. You can play both in solo mode and JxJ mode, which doubles the fun.

I have nothing but good memories of this game. My father was very into it when I was younger and taught me some tactics. Sadly, I have forgotten most of them, but the [i]nostalgia[/i] is still very ingrained in my heart. It is very sad to see that the game has since pretty much died. I pray that more people give it a chance. In summary, I adore it very much due to nostalgia, as mentioned before. The game is old－fashioned and cheap, I admit, but if you enjoy these types of RTS games and can grab a good promotion, it may be fun for you too.

[b]Do not invade Russia in the winter.[/b]
